title: Gold 5 ranked team LFM - top/mid/adc
body: Hi, we are a gold 5 ranked team down a member or two, just looking for someone who either plays mid, top, or adc at a reasonable level. Add me in-game (Spaghini) if you're interested. Must be able to skype with team and have a positive attitude.

replies.body: already have you added but I play top and mid
